ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Testing... anyone alive out there?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I mostly play weekends, and I was out of town last weekend.  I m still waiting for Ester to get back to us.  Still level 52, although I m three
ygData.messageBody:
Gordon Hughes wrote:
>
> ...or is it just me. I haven't had any updates since Friday.
>
> Hmmm.

Well, I mostly play weekends, and I was out of town last weekend. I'm
still waiting for Ester to get back to us. Still level 52, although I'm
three bubbles in to it now.

Since I last posted about my lucky day in Hate three weeks ago, my best
friend ran me up to Hate last weekend, where Greaves dropped, then I went
to Hate this weekend and got Arms and Helm. So I went from all blue to
complete yellow in five trips, with no duplicate drops of any sort!?!

Add to that the Sarnak sword (of some sort) 12/24, which is, I think,
much better than my Ykesha for offhand (I have a Jade Mace for the
primary, embarrassingly enough), and it was a pretty nice weekend. I'm
at a loss now about how to improve, though. :) I'm gonna have to start
researching capes and stuff.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 52 Half-Elf Bard, Innoruuk
Aangie Stardancer, 25 Human Warrior, Innoruuk
Bisibiku, 12 Gnome Enchantress, Innoruuk
Salana, 11 Barbarian Shamaness, Innoruuk
Smussh, 8 Iksar Monk, Innoruuk
Leenya, 7 Erudite Necromancer, Innoruuk

Yeah, four out of six are female. So sue me.
